title: verify_jwt_authentication_enforcement
description: Test that all API endpoints enforce JWT-based authentication and reject unauthorized requests with appropriate error messages.

title: validate_project_creation_and_update
description: Test project creation and update endpoints to ensure input data is validated against required formats and status transition rules, rejecting invalid data with clear error messages.

title: validate_task_creation_and_status_transitions
description: Test task creation and update endpoints to verify detailed tracking, status transitions, and resource assignments are correctly handled and validated.

title: test_resource_allocation_and_utilization_warnings
description: Test resource creation and update endpoints to ensure utilization metrics are monitored, warnings are triggered when allocation exceeds 80%, and task creation is prevented above 100% without override.

title: verify_quality_gates_configuration_and_evaluation
description: Test quality gates configuration endpoints to ensure gates are correctly created, updated, and evaluated against configured thresholds, triggering appropriate approval workflows.

title: test_release_approval_submission_and_audit_logging
description: Test release approval submission endpoint to verify approvals and rejections are recorded with compulsory comments and complete audit trails.

title: validate_audit_logging_for_crud_operations
description: Test that all CRUD operations on projects, tasks, and resources capture complete before and after states in audit logs.

title: test_dashboard_metrics_loading_and_accuracy
description: Test dashboard metrics endpoint to ensure data loads within 3 seconds under typical loads and reflects accurate aggregated data from database views.

title: test_report_generation_and_polling_endpoints
description: Test report generation endpoints to verify asynchronous report creation, polling for completion, and download URL retrieval for multiple formats.

title: verify_deployment_guides_for_docker_and_hostinger
description: Test deployment procedures using Docker Compose and Hostinger VPS instructions to ensure reproducible local and production deployments.
